entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:22 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:34 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 08:34 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
